author: jiangning-iona
msg: Removed the PlatformMBeanServer option of Celtix instrumentation

author: andreasmyth
msg: Added configuration for WS-Addressing (one property only, controls if duplicate message ids should be allowed).
Updated RM store when creating/terminating sequences, upon receipt of sequence acks etc.
Outgoing application messages now persisted in a separate protocol (system) handler (very last in chain).
Retransmission queue to use a timer task to schedule the ResendInitiator - to allow for cancellation when endpoints are destroyed (but bus continues to run).
Fixed message loss simulator to allow testTwoWayMessageLoss test to pass in fork mode 'none'.
Fixed and Re-enabled RMSource unit test.

author: peterjones
msg: Added "keystore" as a binary extension for the installer.
Couple of minor type_test xsl changes.

author: ulhasbhole
msg: * Fixed JMS Server side to honour ReplyTo wsa Header while replying if present.
* Fixed System Test to get handler chain from endpoint configuration in order to distinguish between System and application handler
* Deleted obsolare handlers.xml from ws addressing and jms system test.
